attributes.action: immediatly scrap plans for a database of electronic information holding details of every phone call and e-mail sent in the UK!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ministers are to consider plans for a database of electronic information holding details of every phone call and e-mail sent in the UK, it has emerged. This is a serious breech of privacy and human rights and should be immediatly scrapped!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
